message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed to revolutionize the industry. It comes with cutting-edge features and unparalleled performance. Given its exceptional capabilities, we believe it's worth more than $1500000 to us. Considering its value, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $2000000. We're confident you'll find its benefits invaluable. Let's discuss how we can make this happen.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price of $2000000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000. This amount aligns better with what I am able to spend while still allowing me to acquire a high-quality product. I look forward to your response.
